lead_paragraph: The Champ Car driver Cristiano da Matta was airlifted to a hospital yesterday after his race car collided with a deer that wandered onto the track in Elkhart Lake, Wis., during a test session at Road America.
snippet: The Champ Car driver Cristiano da Matta was airlifted to a hospital yesterday after his race car collided with a deer that wandered onto the track in Elkhart Lake, Wis., during a test session at Road America.
